content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Smelting Array at position(1.0, 1.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5) with chest at (5.5, 3.5)

### Manufacturing Setup at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5) containing copper cable
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts connecting components

### Power Generation Setup
Consists of:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 36.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5) and (2.5, 34.5)
- Multiple pipe networks connecting these components

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure the connection points are not blocked by other entities
- Make sure you have the required items (pipes) in inventory before attempting to create fluid connections

### Entity placement errors
- Check if the required connection points are accessible before placing fluid-carrying entities
- Plan the layout of fluid networks carefully to avoid blocked connections

### Resource management
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure continuous fuel supply
- Some furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" - verify input material flow
- Several inserters show "waiting for source items" - check the production line flow
